title: discover search input field remains active
body:
**Title:** 	 
- Tapping search icon in Discover brings up the keyboard, but if I swipe left or right to Contacts or Chats the keyboard remains active. 
- The text input field shown in screenshot remains active even after hiding the keyboard (by pressing back on keyboard).

**Device:** 	 samsung SM-G935F, OS Level 23

**Memory:** 	 2814.0/3562.0 MB

**Storage:** 	 19.656/25.389 GB

**Battery:** 	 56, Unplugged

**App Version:** 	 1.0 (1)

**Duration:** 	 161
